long_description: Upgraded with more responsiveness and flexibility than the previous version, the Altra Instinct 2 Road-Running Shoes are just as light yet offer more cushion to keep your feet happy on long runs. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Fully cushioned Instinct 2 shoes have a total stack height of 25mm. Lots of cushion is designed to reduce ankle sprains, stone bruising, overstriding, knee pain, forefoot pain and fatigue. Foot-shaped toe box allows your foot to relax and spread out naturally and keeps the big toe straight for added stability. Quick-dry air mesh uppers. Altra Instinct 2 Road-Running Shoes have grippy rubber outsoles for traction on streets and sidewalks.
short_description: Upgraded with more responsiveness and flexibility than the previous version, the Altra Instinct 2 Road-Running Shoes are just as light yet offer more cushion to keep your feet happy on long runs.
